sub_title: Senior Trainer | Senior Project Leader | Business Developer | Knowledge Broker
summary:
Experienced Project manager as well as trainer and consultant. Expertise in multiple sectors and topics. Quick learner, curious about new and innovative approaches. 

- Protected Food Horticulture/ Production/ Post Harvest
- Project Management/ Project Lead/ Interim Manager
- Value Chain Development for food sector
- Milk production & Dairy Processing (Cheese Making)
- Post Harvest Management of Fruits/ Vegetables
- Swine production, breeding and management

- visited over 35 countries for technical, marketing and project management assistance to exporters/farmers/growers as well as a project management/consulting for government agencies.

- skilled in International Cross-Cultural Relations, Management, Marketing Strategy and Business Development.

- producer of (training) materials, videos for knowledge and skills transfer

- four languages: Dutch, English, Spanish and Chinese (Mandarin).
